alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 3:57PM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Monday. The heaviest snow is expected today through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Winter travel conditions are likely, with slick roads and periods of low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of snow and blowing snow could result in road closures including Interstate 80.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
